comment: Her class is really easy! She may or may not take roll but she claims attendance is mandatory. You dont need to take noted because she posts the powerpoints on D2L. Her test are word for word the study which she goes over with you in class. Easy A. 4 tests, inlcuding the final. the final is only two chapters. the quizzes can be found online !

SOOOO EASY! she is so young and does not know how to run the class in a college level. I love psychology but hate her class. Its just not interesting at all, she keeps it boring. tests are based on study guide but the quizzes you gotta figure out for yourself cause she does not cover the topics properly.
She goes over all the test on the review day so I got an 98 on every test and a 100 on the final. Very easy! She tries to be funny and attendance is important to her

good teacher. super easy class.  loves the subject and knows whats  shes talking about. quizzes are online, she puts up power points and teaches from them too so i only used the book for the online quizzes .gives out study guides and thoroughly goes over them and the test is the actual study guide. you watch tons of interesting videos. take her

Very very sweet! BUT she is so easy. If you're a psych major don't take her, you won't learn anything. If you're not and just need credits, TAKE HER! Easy A. You only need the book for quizzes and to be honest your test scores will be so high you could prob take a 0 on all the quizzes and still make an A.

Wonderful teacher. She helps you and wants you to succeed. Didn't use book a lot, nice in-class discussions sometimes and many engaging topics. Definitely take her class, you will be very happy that you did!!

She's a new teacher so she's still getting used to how to run class and go about things, but she makes the class simple. Power points are read through and put up online, quizzes are online, and tests follow the study guide exactly.

Ms. Brown was very easy. It was her first semester teaching at a college level and taught more like a high school teacher. If you are interested in going into psychology, go to class every day and take notes, if not don't stress about it. the two classes before the test she basically gives you the answers.

She's a new teacher and was a little unsure of how to run the class. Debated on online or in-class tests, but went with in-class tests. She makes study guides directly from the test and tells you the answers to the study guide. You don't even have to pay attention in class. Very easy if you study the study guide.

Take this class, she is a young teacher (like 25) and is so excited to teach her students. She said attendance is mandatory but didn't enforce it. Puts up all the power points online and gives you study guides! She even gave us a christmas gift and gave us all the answers to a quiz if you went to class that day.  She is the best, everyone loves her
Nice lady. A little boring but the tests are easy. She gives you a sheet to prepare for the test.

She goes only by the book. She gives 4 exams and 25 points for each group discussions, which are like four of them. She grades on a point scale, so like if u have  500 ponits that might be like a B or C. read each chapters and study. You should do well.

this class was easy. Although she is not the super best teacher the material is easy and she gives you study guides for everything. Tests are all multi choice and pretty easy. She is boring but gets most of the concepts across
She is pretty easy.  Gives you a study guide about what to expect on the test.  If you go over it, you should do fine.
so boring. she goes over pointless stuff in class and the tests go over the book. when she actually does teach she will go word for word whats in the book. Run!!

She's boring and she has a real trouble trying to explain certain concepts to the class.  She ends her classes early usually but she never goes over all the material.  Tests cover things in the book she never discussed in class. Buy the book, read it, write down notes in class.  Good luck!
She's not that bad, just not particularly good, either.  Study the book and you'll do OK.

I don't think I have ever run into a professor this bad.  She is temporary & working on her doctorate.  She may know psych(debatable), however, she can't teach.  Run as fast as you can!  Her speaking skills are poor & no clarity on what will be tested.
